attributes.action: British cave divers should get a bravery award
attributes.background: Give the British cave divers who spearheaded the successful rescue of the 13 Thai boys and their coach an award in the Queens birthday honours list

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
